title: I'm only worried about 1 nerf for the new Taric...
body:
Will he still have his infamous quote that he is famous for?

{{champion:44}} "Gems, gems are truly outrageous. They are truly, truly, truly, outrageous."

replies.body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pBPXFZmKQuQ
[(https://youtu.be/KS7dBTDOnbA)]
when his rework goes through, this needs to be his login screen music.
that's pretty gay, and that's ok
I'm laughing so hard omg I can't breathe halp
Lmao I'm dying.
{{champion:81}} Time to get our hands dirty ;3

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThRRf2fY,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2015-09-24T07:02:20.162+0000)
>
> {{champion:81}} Time to get our hands dirty ;3

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BRPMN0jXe1Q
My eyes,
Oh god why

We haven't landed on VO for new Taric. We do want to keep him familiar in a fun/charming way, but we also don't want to go too hard on making him a joke character. As for that specific line, we've talked about keeping it or having a new line that serves as some kind of homage to it.

if you drop that line from his VO i will lose whatever faith i had left in your re-works. There is no reason whatsoever to not keep it as a joke. JOKES ARE ALLOWED TO NOT BE GRIMDARK AND SOMETIMES BE SILLY
How much faith did you have left, at this point i feel like im literally sadomasochistic for still buying rp.
not much. sometimes i feel like the victim of sunk-cost fallacy

That's a innacurate of an analogy. I feel more like some of the characters went through one of the awful Hollywood reboots of old franchises that took a funny IP and made it super serious. At least I didn't have to pay for it though.

I do feel... wrong playing the new Gangplank. His kit is better and more fun sure. His personality is so different though that he is literally a whole new character. The only thing that tethers new GP to the old one personality-wise for me is Toy Soldier GP because it didn't change too much visually (really awesome work by whoever did that).

I appreciate the reworks of GP and Sion overall but I will always miss what they once were as characters. 

I just got Taric and never really played him much before, but I really hope he does not get the Sion/GP personality treatment. It is great that there are still fun and silly characters. The crazy cast of the original champ pool is something that really made an impression on me when I joined. I would rather we get more serious characters released than we take older characters and make them super "grimdark" as Merxamers put it.
Indeed. They allowed Heimer to keep is swag walk, I see nothing wrong with letting Taric keep his joke, or at the least keep the "outrageous" part.

Well, to be honest, it's less of a joke and more of a reference.

It still should be kept in some way, shape, or form, because it does fit Taric's character, and it's quite possibly his most well-known and iconic line.
I mean Yi kept "Wuju.. pass me that potion?" and "Your skills are inferior!" so I don't see any reason to drop Taric's line.
This. Regardless of the state of Taric's eventual VO update, he HAS to keep that joke. To do otherwise would be like removing Garen's "DEMACIA!!!" from his W.

NO PLEASE DON'T KILL ANOTHER FUNNY CHARACTER.
We want ridiculousness **too**. Obviously a large part of the roster must be somewhat believable, but please, it's fiction for a damn game, you can have unlikely things, in particular when the lore doesn't affect the gameplay and **don't tell me it's to make it fit in the lore because that thing is all over the place and yet to be defined post-retcon.** We want funny. We want stupid.

We want {{champion:80}} to dream of being a baker!

Let him dream!

Just as long as he talks about stuff other than gems when walking. 

Let's not make him obsessive ok?  We got enough champions like that.

Azur: SHURIMA WILL RISE AGAIN! 

Me: I'm sick of your shit Azir! Get over it!!

Azir: 
....
 *Shurima*~
^This.
If yer plannin on keeping it, try it with 1 few 'truly's. Personally I think "They are truly truly outrageous" sounds better. (with proper emphasis in all the right areas)

> [{quoted}](name=Thryale,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThRRf2fY,comment-id=00140005,timestamp=2015-09-24T20:58:47.800+0000)
>
> If yer plannin on keeping it, try it with 1 few 'truly's. Personally I think "They are truly truly outrageous" sounds better. (with proper emphasis in all the right areas)

Lol if you drop a truly he isn't quoting the thing the joke is a reference to,
https://youtu.be/lkQE5wuBFeY 
'Jem is truly outrageous, Truly, truly, truly outrageous.' If you remove one it isn't even a joke anymore. Just a hollow shell of sadness {{champion:44}}
O.o didn't know it was referencing anything! And I've been playing this game for 5 yrs now. :/ wow XD

I'm honestly confused by the fact that there's even a semblance of discussion about dropping that line

At most it should have been ''We're keeping that joke, right?''

If the line is not included, an homage would be fine.

Just make sure it exists in some capacity!

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThRRf2fY,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-09-24T19:24:35.706+0000)
>
> We haven't landed on VO for new Taric. We do want to keep him familiar in a fun/charming way, but we also don't want to go too hard on making him a joke character. As for that specific line, we've talked about keeping it or having a new line that serves as some kind of homage to it.

Please keep!

You'll keep it.
Understood?

But it's his actual "joke", and every champion has one. Why change it? It doesn't make the rest of his character any less serious -- unless Malzahar is also a joke character for burping and saying a voidling came out.

Please keep the "you are glass waiting to be smashed"
now just replace glass with out the gl :))

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThRRf2fY,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-09-24T19:24:35.706+0000)
>
> We haven't landed on VO for new Taric. We do want to keep him familiar in a fun/charming way, but we also don't want to go too hard on making him a joke character. As for that specific line, we've talked about keeping it or having a new line that serves as some kind of homage to it.

if this is his "joke", I don't think it would take away from him at all as being a serious character. I mean, its his joke. It should be hilarious. Now should everything about him be as ridiculous as that line? probably not. but this is like a huge part of what people love about taric. his outrageous gems. 

If you keep him fun/charming/serious in all other aspects of his kit then I think people will take him seriously still. the line will not make him a "joke character"

"infamous quote that he is famous for"

my mind went derp.

Best 10 minutes you'll ever spend: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Grfas7AGl8k

Cheers,

Brandon

This is obviously a preview of all his new VO lines.

And it's perfect.
Damn, was hoping for 10 minutes of "truly" before a single "outrageous".

Riot has to know how important this is to his playstyle. I think they'll not only keep it, but buff it by making it global.

In fact, I'm betting the reason the rework isn't finished yet is simply because Riot hasn't quite ironed out the code that changes your background wallpaper to a picture of Taric every time he kills you.
I swear to god, I will quit league if they don't keep that quote. There is nothing I enjoy more than going to lane and spamming that quote the entire game.
i will quit league i have 600+ euros in if they fuck taric up like they did sion.
Then you're in good hands, because they did an amazing job with Sion.

they didnt fuck up sion. i know the old sion was fun but with the nieuw sion you can do so much more fun strategic plays. But they should make players possible to use his original skin too because both the reworked and the old skin are both pretty awsome.
That's a lot of words in one sentence. Not that it's not true tho, I've never played the olde Sion, but the new one's really fun

Old sion looked awesome and sounded too. Also ad sion was my main, fuckin rito. New sion is good, but despite that they still DELETED a champion. IMAGINE OF YOUR MAIN WAS REMOVED FROM THE GAME. That's the point. There may be nothing left of Taric.   

Why was i downvoted? Its true, what if your main were removed?

I hope those down votes are to troll me cause seriously, what if they reworked zed and the result was shen. OH the Q Q on boards would cause an overflow.

i like taric but besides his stun and in earlygame his heal isn't that usefull in most cases. so him getting rework might be something really exciting .
but i agree what they did with sion was alitle but to much.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/W3TwRPWs-a-comprehensive-taric-reworkbring-the-gem-knight-back
Let me know what you think of this Taric rework.
Taking into account Riot's penchant for ruining almost everything about a champions identity and/or character through VU's I think it's safe to say they'll fuck something up.

It's not a VU.

They said it was close to Sion level rework.
Kassadin still talks about silencing, so odds are it ain't going anywhere
